instructions: Make sure the SIM card is inserted. Turn on your device and wait for the welcome screen to appear. Tap Start . If necessary, select a Wi-Fi network. Tap Next . Tap Yes to the 'Get Google' screen to set up your Google account. Tap No to create a new Google account. Enter your Google email and password. Tap the arrow in the lower right to advance to the next screen. Tap OK to agree to Google Terms of Service. Select or clear the following Google settings: BACKUP AND RESTORE LOCATION COMMUNICATION Tap the arrow in the lower right to advance to the next screen. If desired, sign into your HTC account. Select one of the following radio button: Get content from your old phone Skip Tap NEXT . Update the Auto sync selections as desired. Tap NEXT . The 'Personalize and secure screen' appears. Enter desired name into PHONE NAME field. If desired tap Screen lock to secure your phone. Follow any additional prompts. Tap NEXT . If desired, select the Allow Diagnostics check box. Tap MORE to learn more about diagnostics. Tap FINISH to complete the initial setup.

From any screen, touch and hold the Menu key. A list of your recently accessed applications and tasks appears. Tap the thumbnail of an application to switch to that window. Swipe a thumbnail to the side to close that app or tap Clear all .
